@graph.name: Homemade Chicken Nuggets - JoyFoodSunshine
@graph.description: Healthy homemade chicken nuggets are flavorful and moist! Marinated chicken is coated in a spiced breadcrumb mixture & baked in the oven.

@graph.name: How do you cut a chicken breast into nuggets?

acceptedAnswer.text: Cut the chicken breast in half lengthwise to make two thin pieces, then cut those pieces into 1" cubes.

@graph.name: How do you get batter to stick to chicken?

acceptedAnswer.text: The trick to this is dipping the chicken into flour first, then dipping it into the egg and then the breadcrumbs.

@graph.name: What do chicken nuggets go with?

acceptedAnswer.text: So many things! Roasted vegetables, mac and cheese, salads, etc.

@graph.name: What sauce do people eat with chicken nuggets?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our favorites include: BBQ sauce, ketchup, honey, ranch dressing, sweet chili sauce, and hummus!

@graph.name: Healthy Homemade Chicken Nuggets
@graph.description: These homemade chicken nuggets are flavorful and moist! These healthy chicken nuggets are baked and not fried for a delicious weeknight meal your whole family will love.

video.name: Healthy Homemade Chicken Nuggets
video.description: These homemade chicken nuggets are flavorful and moist! Marinated chicken is coated in a spiced breadcrumb mixture then baked in the oven - not fried. A healthy weeknight meal your whole family will love.

itemListElement.text: Mix together salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, and onion powder.
itemListElement.name: Mix together salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, and onion powder.

itemListElement.text: Place chicken cubes in a bowl and drizzle with olive oil, turn to coat with oil.
itemListElement.name: Place chicken cubes in a bowl and drizzle with olive oil, turn to coat with oil.

itemListElement.text: Add 2 tsp of the spice mixture and stir to coat (save the rest of the spice mixture to use later).
itemListElement.name: Add 2 tsp of the spice mixture and stir to coat (save the rest of the spice mixture to use later).

itemListElement.text: Cover and let the chicken marinate in the refrigerator for 1-2 hours or at room temperature for 30 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Cover and let the chicken marinate in the refrigerator for 1-2 hours or at room temperature for 30 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Place a wire rack on a baking sheet and grease it by spraying with cooking spray, set aside.
itemListElement.name: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Place a wire rack on a baking sheet and grease it by spraying with cooking spray, set aside.

itemListElement.text: In a small bowl, combine remaining spice mixture and breadcrumbs. Set aside.
itemListElement.name: In a small bowl, combine remaining spice mixture and breadcrumbs. Set aside.

itemListElement.text: Place ½ cup flour in a plastic bag. Add marinated chicken pieces and shake to coat. (Alternatively, you can put the chicken in a large, clean dry bowl, add flour and stir until evenly coated).
itemListElement.name: Place ½ cup flour in a plastic bag. Add marinated chicken pieces and shake to coat. (Alternatively, you can put the chicken in a large, clean dry bowl, add flour and stir until evenly coated).

itemListElement.text: In a small bowl, whisk together eggs and milk.
itemListElement.name: In a small bowl, whisk together eggs and milk.

itemListElement.text: Dip each floured piece of chicken into the egg mixture, then into the bread crumb mixture, space evenly on the prepared wire rack on the baking sheet.
itemListElement.name: Dip each floured piece of chicken into the egg mixture, then into the bread crumb mixture, space evenly on the prepared wire rack on the baking sheet.

itemListElement.text: Spray the tops of the chicken nuggets with cooking spray.
itemListElement.name: Spray the tops of the chicken nuggets with cooking spray.

itemListElement.text: Bake in preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until internal temperature is 160 degrees F on an instant-read thermometer.
itemListElement.name: Bake in preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until internal temperature is 160 degrees F on an instant-read thermometer.

itemListElement.text: Serve warm with your favorite dipping sauces.
itemListElement.name: Serve warm with your favorite dipping sauces.
